Text: Trading in ERCOTWeve got a new product that you might be interested in Its a nextgeneration POWER TRADING system and it utilizes the most advanced technology available today to deliver extremely fast processing for large complex portfolios Power XL is used by power and gas traders to manage downtothehour positions and PL in realtime without the need to run batch processes or reports Slice and dice positions and trading results in realtime on your desktop Whether or not you are happy with your current system wed like you to take a look at Power XL No obligation no expectations Just tell us when and where For more information visit pxl or call me to schedule a demonstration Jeff Triple Point Technology Inc IMAGE
